first_para: Henry Campbell Bellingham (born 29 March 1955) is a British Conservative politician. He was appointed Parliamentary Under Secretary of State at the Foreign and Commonwealth Office on 14 May 2010, a position he held until 5 September 2012. In Parliament, he represents the constituency of North West Norfolk.

full.extract:
Henry Campbell Bellingham (born 29 March 1955) is a British Conservative politician. He was appointed Parliamentary Under Secretary of State at the Foreign and Commonwealth Office on 14 May 2010, a position he held until 5 September 2012. In Parliament, he represents the constituency of North West Norfolk.
^ "Our Ministers " Henry Bellingham MP". Foreign and Commonwealth Office. Retrieved 2010-11-10. 
^ "MP Henry Bellingham loses minister post". Eastern Daily Press. Retrieved 2012-09-06.
full.title: Henry Bellingham (politician)
